name: For the Blue in the Sky
name_original: For the Blue in the Sky
description:
For the Blue in the Sky

Controls: Up & Down arrow keys to change dialogue, Left & Right arrows move comic panels back and forth. ESC to quit at any time.

The story would probably be categorized as "science fiction," but it's based on a real proposed solution to climate change. Read more here.

All donations go to the Environmental Defense Fund. 

Some rave reviews from my friends: 

"omg this is SAD"

"hey ... how would you like to feel some EMOTIONS this friday evening"

"I AM CRYING NOW"

Sky animations created in Max/MSP/Jitter. Special thanks to Alexander Dupuis.
